list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: try to find something by looking or otherwise seeking carefully and thoroughly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I searched among the rocks, but there was nothing
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi tìm kiếm giữa những tảng đá, nhưng không có gì

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of searching for someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the police carried out a thorough search of the premises
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cảnh sát đã thực hiện tìm kiếm kỹ lưỡng các cơ sở
